cause.description:
To raise awareness of child abuse in all it's forms (mental abuse, physical abuse and sexual abuse).
Also to raise money to help with the fight againse child abuse.
1. No Child Should Be Allowed To Be Abused
2. To Get People To Report Any And All Abuse
3. To Raise Money for Child Abuse
4. Also Raise Awareness For Abuse To Anyone
cause.name: Save A Child
